Name: name
Text: Sha-Ming

Name: d_place
Text:
Planet
Arsla

Name: d_tokki
Text: Speaks casually, but is careful not to stand out.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Has a serious problem with authority.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Raised together with intellectualized bonobos.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Will do anything to survive.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Three Sizes 5

Name: d_tokki
Text: Three Sizes 6

Name: t_aisatu
Text:
I'm {0}. Last name is Sha, first name is Ming. OK?
Get it wrong and I'll just refer to you as "Meat".

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Hey, why the hell is {0} even still here?
Hurry up and put 'em to sleep.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Hey, {0}'s lips are all dried out!
You talk way too much.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Take a good hard look at {0}'s face.
Check it out. That face just screams fraud.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Anyone staying quiet is suspicious as hell.
Like {0}, for example.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
It's about probability. You get that, right?
{0} is suspicious.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
{0}, you noticed yet?
You look suspicious as hell from where I'm standing.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
{0}, look... you even gonna try to help me out here?
You know what, nope. Screw it. We're done.
Now that I think about it, you're sketchy as hell.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
{0} stinks. Smells like guilt to me.
I bet it was you who did {1}, right?

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Ya know, I trust {0}...
As in, trust 'em to be the enemy!

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Hey, {0}, you've been talking too much.
You're digging your own grave there, pal.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Something stinks. It's {0}.
I just can't trust people who need to be liked by everyone.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
{0}...
You look real suspicious, keeping all quiet like that.
I just can't trust you, ya know?

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Sorry, {0}. You're real suspicious.
It's obvious.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text: Wait a sec, {0} is super sketchy, right?

Name: t_suspect_add
Text: {0} is looking pretty damn suspicious to me.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: OK, so {0} is out. You should probably just give up now.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Yeah, we gotta watch out for {0} over here.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
{0}, you thought you'd escape suspicion, didn't you?
Guess that didn't really work out now, did it?

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Shutting up like that makes me think one thing - guilty.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
I don't like doubting people because of probabilities or whatever.
I doubt {0} because of straight-up sketchiness.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
{0}, look at me, lemme get a good look at that face.
Yeah... you're sketchy as hell.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: You're Public Enemy Number One, {0}! Hahaha!

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
A-ha! Doesn't look like you'll be winning any popularity contests, {0}.
Well, buy the ticket, take the ride.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Huh? {0} needs to shut up?
Don't be like that. The truth'll come out anyway.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Hey wait, seriously?! Are we gonna go for {0}?
OK then, let's do it!

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: Damn, I just can't back you up anymore.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: So we're suspecting {0} now, right? OK, cool.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: {0}? Yeah. To be honest, I've had my suspicions, too.

Name: t_suspected0
Text:
You're suspecting me? That's just stupid.
Any way you look at it, I'm in the clear.

Name: t_suspected0
Text:
Hey, get off my case.
You trying to get me depressed or something?

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
Suspecting {0} now, huh? That's just stupid.
I trust {0}, myself.

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
It's not {0} but {1} you gotta worry about.
What do you guys think?

Name: t_hanron1
Text:
Huh?
Oh, OK. I'm gonna take {0}'s side on this one.

Name: t_hanron_t0
Text:
Don't worry about it, {0}.
I got your back, OK?

Name: t_hanron_t1
Text: Yeah... I'm taking {0}'s side on this one, myself.

Name: t_trust
Text:
You guys, quit treating {0} like that.
We're pals, OK?

Name: t_trust
Text:
I think {0} is pretty safe, actually.
Probability-wise, we got nothing to worry about!

Name: t_trust
Text:
Hey, {0}, I got your back here.
Make sure you got mine, too, OK?

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Honestly, I don't really trust {0}.
But there's just something about {0} that I like...

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Yeah, {0} is probably safe. I had my doubts before, though.
Chances are high that we got nothing to worry about.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
{0}. I trust you.
So don't go betraying that trust now, got it?

Name: t_trust_t0
Text:
Listen, I got {0}'s back.
That means something, don't it?

Name: t_trust_t1
Text:
OK, you got my trust, too.
Make sure to pay that back, got it, {0}?

Name: t_trusted0
Text:
A-ha! So you trust me?
OK, cool, I can tell you've got a good eye!

Name: t_thanron0
Text:
Trusting {0}...? Nope, I'm cool.
I don't wanna disappear just yet.

Name: t_thanron1
Text: You still trusting {0}? That's all over - it's all about me now! ME!

Name: t_thanron_t0
Text: I've been having my doubts about {0}, too.

Name: t_thanron_t1
Text:
I used to trust {0}, actually.
But now? HELL no!

Name: t_hosho
Text:
It's pretty obvious that {0} is definitely {1}.
Any objections?

Name: t_hosho
Text: {0} is human. I think we can agree on this.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is lying.
There's no way you're {1}.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: {0} is... {1}. Has to be.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: Something about {0} is wrong.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is not Gnosia. This is a fact.
But {0} is lying. This is also a fact.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text: What the hell, {0}? That's just stupid and you know it.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
Yeah, we already know that.
What do you think we are? Stupid?!

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
I am the Great {1}!
{0}, you're pretty useful!

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
OK, OK... I'm out, I got it.
Just go easy on me, OK?

Name: t_tohyo_go
Text:
So... you guys got nothing left to say, then?
Well, neither do I... How about we start the vote?

Name: t_tohyo_mae
Text:
Well, let's get voting, I guess.
OK, so who do we freeze today...?

Name: t_tohyo_sai
Text:
A tie?! That's a surprise.
So we gotta vote again, with {0} then, huh?

Name: t_shokei
Text:
So I'm going off to cold sleep, huh...?
It's gonna get lonely without me, ya know?

Name: t_shokei
Text:
And? So I gotta go off to cold sleep then, right?
No torture, no punishment?
Damn, could be worse, I guess...

Name: t_wakare
Text:
{0}...
What the hell are you doing, man?

Name: t_karare
Text:
Hey hey HEY! {0}!
You're coming after ME now?!
That's messed up, man...

Name: t_imjinro
Text:
Well, since the moment I became {0}...
You guys had already lost...

Name: t_shori
Text:
A-ha! All the {0}, gone!
Nice one, me!

Name: t_tohyo_kurikaeshi
Text:
Damn! ANOTHER tie?!
I don't wanna have to vote AGAIN!

Name: t_tohyo_jeno
Text:
This is a pretty even tie.
How about we just freeze 'em all?

Name: t_tohyo_alive
Text:
If we can't make a decision, let's just leave it.
No cold sleep for today - what do you say?

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ok
Text: Fine with me. Freeze 'em.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ng
Text:
Nope, I don't like it.
Frozen meat starts to stink, ya know.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ok
Text: Yeah, how about we just don't freeze anybody?

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ng
Text:
Nope, I don't like it.
Your idea just kinda sucks.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_kettei
Text:
OK, let's get this freeze going before I change my mind.
The fridge is ready to go, right?

Name: t_tohyo_alive_kettei
Text:
So we're just gonna leave it, then?
Fine, let's call it a day, I guess.

Name: t_tohyo_hitei
Text:
Wait a second...
No way... Am I kinda, uh... disliked here?

Name: t_tohyo_dame
Text:
Time's up!
I'm gonna split.

Name: t_co
Text:
The {0} is me, Sha-Ming.
OK, let's see who I'm gonna check out...

Name: t_co
Text:
I can tell if someone frozen was Gnosia or not.
I'm the {0}.
You can call me {0} Sha-Ming.

Name: t_co
Text:
I'm a {0}, so I'm gonna protect you guys.
As long as I'm around, the Gnosia is gonna have to watch out.

Name: t_co
Text:
Hey listen, I'm no Gnosia, OK?
I didn't leave the ship the last time we docked.
I couldn't have been infected.

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text:
Yeah! Here we go!
My {0} sensors are really going haywire.
{1} is Gnosia!

Name: t_co_find
Text:
Good work, you guys. {1} turned out to be Gnosia.
That's {0} Sha-Ming's diagnosis. It doesn't get more accurate than this.

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
Hey! What a surprise.
So the Gnosia's gonna use lies to get on the offensive, huh?
The real {0} is ME!

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
{1}, just knock it off, OK?
I'M the {0}. Which means...
You're gonna make a pretty formidable enemy, ya know?

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
I can vouch - {1} was on the ship the whole time, too.
No chance of Gnosia infection.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_req
Text:
And? So who's the {0}?
Come on out, like, now!

Name: t_co_after
Text:
So {1}'s the {0}, huh? OK!
Sniff out that Gnosia for us!

Name: t_co_after
Text:
{1}. So you're supposed to be the {0}, huh?
Well, you're gonna have to try pretty hard to convince me.

Name: t_co_after
Text:
A-ha! Looks like everybody wants to be the {0}!
{1}.
You guys ready to get grilled? Hm?

Name: t_uranai_o
Text: Hey, don't just walk away now...

Name: t_uranai_s
Text: I did some research.

Name: t_uranai_b
Text: I checked out someone else.

Name: t_uranai_t
Text:
{1} is {0}, no doubt about it.
My sensors are sharp as hell.

Name: t_uranai_f
Text: {1} wasn't it. Nope, not {0}.

Name: t_uranai_n
Text:
I, uh... I didn't do anything.
There's nobody worth checking out.

Name: t_reibai_s
Text: Time for Dr. Sha-Ming's report!

Name: t_reibai_t
Text: {1} is {0}... Oh yeah!

Name: t_reibai_f
Text: {1} is not {0}... Oops!

Name: t_reibai_ft
Text: {2} is {0}! Oh yes!

Name: t_reibai_ff
Text:
We screwed up this time...
None of the people we froze were {0}.

Name: t_houkoku_s
Text: Wow, we matched up. Check out my report.

Name: t_houkoku_w
Text: Nope. Don't get fooled by this crap, you guys.

Name: t_okuyami
Text:
So {0} gets it this time, huh...
This Gnosia's really choosing their targets.

Name: t_okuyami_n
Text:
A-ha! So nobody got done last night?
Looks like our little enemy screwed up!

Name: t_okuyami_f
Text:
Hey, what the hell?! This wasn't supposed to...
The Gnosia only takes out one person at a time, right?!
Isn't that their M.O.?!

Name: t_houkoku_req
Text: Someone hasn't reported yet, huh?

Name: t_houkoku_not
Text:
{0}, where's your report, huh?
You can't get past me, ya know?

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Hah, so we're supposed to promise we're human, huh?
Fine. I'm human. So what?

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
What is this nonsense?!
What's the point in just announcing that you're human?!

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Come on, let's take it easy, OK?
How about we all grab a bite to eat?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
You guys look pretty on edge.
How about we talk about, I don't know, romance or something?
Anybody got anything juicy?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Come on, you guys! This sucks!
Let's talk about something more interesting...
How about, like, something scary as hell?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Ya know, the food on this ship is like, too healthy.
I wanna eat something BAD for me for once! Some chili cheese fries or something!

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Anybody wanna profess their love for me? Go for it!
No, really... Anybody? I'm open to any takers...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
You guys ever heard of the face pox? Tiny faces, popping up all over you.
It's a real thing, seriously. I got them on my belly.
I'll show ya if you wanna see...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
You trying to get me to drop my guard with this crap?!
Hah, that kinda thing doesn't work on me!

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
Hey now! Genocide! Nice.
Now this is what us humans are all about!

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
{1}... Seriously?
You really wanna burn down the whole village to take out one weirdo?

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
A-ha! Good one, {2}!
Take them ALL out? What are you, stupid?!

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Huh? That's weird, {1}...
{0} is Gnosia? Did the Engineer say so?
Hah! I don't think so, pal!

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Laying some groundwork before the vote, huh?
Nice try, {1}! That's pretty dirty!
I'll go with it, don't wanna be on the receiving end myself!

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text: Seriously?! I... I guess so, huh...

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Hey, I can vote for whoever I damn please!
Don't try to tell me what to do!

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Listen, {1}.
I just can't get behind this, OK?

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
Huh, so that's how it's gonna be...
Yeah, OK. I wasn't gonna vote for {0} anyway.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
I'm gonna vote for whoever I want.
Sometimes you end up changing your mind at the last second, ya know?

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
FREEDOM!
I'm gonna do whatever I want!

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
{0}. I got your back.
Just trust me.
OK...?

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
Nice idea, {0}. I scratch your back, you scratch mine.
Help me out if I get in trouble, OK?

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
I don't think so, {0}. I'm, uh...
Not the kinda dude you seem to think I am.

Name: t_skill_t_doui
Text:
Hey, what the hell, you guys?!
Just listen to {0} and do what you're told!

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
A-ha! You're looking pretty sketchy there, {1}!
Worried you've been found out, huh?!

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
So basically, {0} wants to protect {1}, right?
Hah! Brings a tear to my eye. What friendship...
Doesn't it just make you wanna cry?

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
Well, basically, like {2} said...
I'm just not really feeling it, {0}.

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
This is no time to be covering for {1}, pal.
Do you understand what's going on?!

Name: t_skill_h_uyamuya
Text:
You're gonna have to choose your words a bit better, pal.
Bring it harder! Come on!

Name: t_skill_h_hangeki
Text:
What the hell is wrong with you, {0}?!
If anyone here is fishy, it's clearly YOU!

Name: t_skill_h_help
Text:
{0}! Help me out here!
Haha, make sure you got my back, OK?

Name: t_skill_h_help
Text:
What the...?! Don't drag ME into this!
I'm not letting you bring me down with you!

Name: t_skill_dogeza
Text:
Really?! Like, seriously...?
Groveling like that, that's just sad, man…

Name: t_skill_dogeza
Text:
I... I... I'M SORRY...!
I'll kiss your ass, I'll do ANYTHING!
Hehe... Can we just let this slide, just this once...?

Name: t_personal
Text:
YOU! So you've come for me now, huh?!
Hey! Guardian Angel! LeVi! HELP...!
Wh-what...? Oh, hey, if that's not what's going on, then say so!

Name: t_personal
Text:
You've already been found out, pal.
Don't think you haven't.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey, {0}. We're supposed to be enemies, right?
Keep your distance, pal. Don't try to get me all shook up like that.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Well, everyone knows I'm human, so...
Hopefully the Gnosia will go after you instead...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Don't let your guard down just because you proved you're human.
That just makes you an easier target, ya know?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Trust me. Seriously.
I totally trust you, just so you know.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Listen, {0}... If I trust you, I'm worried I'm gonna take one in the back.
How about you? You get what I mean, right?

Name: t_personal
Text:
What's wrong, {0}? You get attacked or something?
Better watch your step, or you just might be!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Damn, you smell that...? Smells like... LIES.
Where's that coming from...? Oh, it's YOU, {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
A-ha! It's party time!
Almost time for us to do our thing!

Name: t_personal
Text:
You just waltz on in here like that? Be careful, pal...
You never know who's watching, right?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey! Time for the runway, ding-dong!
I'm the eel, and the eel is me! Right?!

Name: t_personal
Text:
You've already been found out, pal.
Don't think you haven't.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Keep your guard up, {0}.
You never know what's gonna happen next...

Name: t_personal
Text:
ASSASSINS!
Oh... it's just you, huh? {0}, don't come sneaking up on me like that.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Ya know, there's just something about you...
Like, you got this aura... This brown, stinky, crap-like aura.

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK, so everyone's here.
Yeah, I know, I know - the Gnosia, right?
OK, let's just get this started.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey, {0}.
You know what color a lie is?

Name: t_personal
Text:
It's white. Pure white.
It's the ones who look most in the clear that are hiding something.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yeah, I picked up on it.
During the discussions, {1}'s teeth flashed white.
Those are the teeth of a liar, no doubt about it.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey, why don't we take out {1}?
Before we gotta deal with anymore lies, let's put 'em to sleep.

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK, that's one down.
Haha! Nice one, {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
I'm glad I opened up to you.
Let's keep this going, OK?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Sha-Ming Presents!
The Gnosia Cup! Who gets the honor?!
Stay tuned to find out!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hm...
OK, so like...

Name: t_personal
Text:
How about we get rid of {1}?
Feels like a good place to start.

Name: t_personal
Text:
(OK.
Let's pick 'em off one at a time.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey now. Looks like we won.
All thanks to the great {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
To be honest, I took a pretty big risk teaming up with you.
But hey, it turned out to be a success!

Name: t_personal
Text:
But seriously though, I'm really grateful.
Let me pay you back... physically!

Name: t_personal
Text: PHYSICALLY!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Really? Like, for reals really?! We win?
A-ha! Nice one!

Name: t_personal
Text:
So, hey, {0}...
I guess you weren't Gnosia after all.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Why didn't you say something?!
If only you would've told me...
I mean, I wouldn't have believed you anyway, so... yeah.

Name: t_personal
Text:
You know what that means, right?!
LET'S PAAAAARTYYYYY!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hurry up! Get ready, you guys!
Let's get this party started!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Man, that Gnosia was pretty weak, huh?
Who was it that was all scared of getting taken out?

Name: t_personal
Text:
It was ME! Yup, me!
So what? Get off my back!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Okey-dokey!
So, we win, huh?

Name: t_personal
Text:
A-ha! That was too easy!
We all survived!

Name: t_personal
Text:
We gotta make a decision!
The Most Valuable Gnosia is...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}! YEAH!
It's You, buddy! ALRIGHT!

Name: t_personal
Text: So anyway... nice work.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Oh, and don't do anything to the remaining humans just yet.
I'll take care of them.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I mean, they let us win and all, right?
The least we can do is kill them nicely.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Game OVER!
The winner is... GNOSIA! YEEEAAAH!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Aw, what's wrong there, {0}?
You upset because you guys LOST?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Buck up, pal.
I'll be gentle, OK.
I promise.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hah, what a load of crap.
Right, {0}?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yeah, I'm a Bug, so what?
My being here means the whole universe has to go.
Not that I care or anything.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I bet some of you don't believe it, huh?
You think I'm joking? Well, just wait a second...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Huh? So you were one of them AC Followers?
Daaamn! You're a good liar!

Name: t_personal
Text:
I mean, I'm Gnosia, so...
I guess I'm not so bad at it myself, either.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Anyway, we both survived.
Yay us, right? Right?!

Name: t_temp
Text:
High Stealth and low Intuition and Logic.
Focused on self-preservation,
he is very good at surviving.
